Utility by which reports may give a table more of an appearance of being organized into groups.

Adds a nested controller whose lifetime is tied to that of the present controller.

View control for the information dialog
allAppointments - Variable in class controller.AppointmentFilter
A reference to the caller-maintained list of all possible appointments.
allAppointments - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsController
A list of all of the appointments in the database, regardless of which appointments are currently being shown.
allButton - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsController
Radio button selecting a view of all appointments
APP_TITLE - Static variable in class Main
Title of the application
appContext - Variable in class controller.Controller
The app context in which the controller runs
AppContext - Interface in support
Interface providing access to application-wide resources and values.
append(String, boolean) - Static method in class support.LoginLog
Appends a record for a login to the log file.
appointment - Variable in class controller.AppointmentController
Appointment being modified, or null to indicate adding an appointment
Appointment - Class in model
Class representing an appointment, containing information about the appointment from the database or prepared for storage in the database.
Appointment(long, String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, String, LocalDateTime, String, long, long, long, ContactCache) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructs an appointment from database-provided information.
Appointment(String, String, String, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, String, long, long, long, ContactCache) - Constructor for class model.Appointment
Constructs an appointment from user-provided information in preparation for storage in the database.
AppointmentController - Class in controller
Controller for managing the windows that add and modify appointments.
AppointmentController(AppContext, Appointment, Refreshable) - Constructor for class controller.AppointmentController
Constructs a window for displaying a form to add or modify an appointment.
AppointmentDao - Class in database
DAO providing read/write access to appointments in the database, which it represents in the application as instances of Appointment.
AppointmentDao(Connection, User) - Constructor for class database.AppointmentDao
Constructs an appointment DAO in contexts where a contact cache is NOT already available.
AppointmentDao(Connection, User, ContactCache) - Constructor for class database.AppointmentDao
Constructs an appointment DAO in contexts where a contact cache is already available, sparing the DAO from having to load it.
AppointmentDao.MonthTypeCount - Class in database
POJO for objects returned by getMonthTypeCounts() for the report of appointment counts by appointment month and type.
AppointmentFilter - Class in controller
Base class of filters for the appointments tab on the main window, also serving as a namespace for the different filters, implemented as subclasses.
AppointmentFilter(ObservableList<Appointment>) - Constructor for class controller.AppointmentFilter
Constructs an appointment filter for the provided list of appointments.
AppointmentFilter.Monthly - Class in controller
Filter of appointments by month, showing one month at a time.
AppointmentFilter.None - Class in controller
Filter that does not filter at all, resulting in a display of all appointments.
AppointmentFilter.Weekly - Class in controller
Filter of appointments by week, showing one week at a time.
AppointmentsByContact - Class in reports
Report generating a table of appointments sorted by contact name, showing contact names in the first column, and replacing duplicate contact names with quotation marks to emphasize contact groupings.
AppointmentsByContact() - Constructor for class reports.AppointmentsByContact
 
AppointmentsByMonthAndType - Class in reports
Report generating a table of appointment counts for each combination of month and appointment type, sorted by month.
AppointmentsByMonthAndType() - Constructor for class reports.AppointmentsByMonthAndType
 
AppointmentsController - Class in controller
Manages the appointments tab on the main window.
AppointmentsController() - Constructor for class controller.AppointmentsController
Constructs the controller for the appointments tab and shows the scene.
appointmentsTab - Variable in class controller.MainController
 
appointmentTitleField - Variable in class controller.AppointmentController
 
APPT_MINUTES_INCREMENT - Static variable in class controller.AppointmentController
The user is only allowed to set meeting start and end times to multiples of this number of minutes in the hour
availableReports - Variable in class controller.ReportsController
Array of reports to make available from this tab
